name: Pineapple Lemonade
description: So refreshing, so sweet, so tangy and just so wonderfully tropical.
directions: To make the simple syrup, combine sugar and 1 cup water in a medium saucepan over medium heat, stirring until the sugar has dissolved; let cool.
In a large pitcher, whisk together simple syrup, lemon juice, pineapple juice, lime juice
Transfer to a clean container and refrigerate it
Give a quick stir and serve chilled.
